'''Ancient Red-Mane Boar''' is a type of [[Boar]] that can be found in the wild in [[Natlan]].

==Drops==
{{Card|Raw Meat|3}}

Catching or killing one for the first time will add this creature's entry into the player's in-game [[archive]].

==Locations==
Currently, Ancient Red-Mane Boars are found exclusively in [[Atocpan]], [[Natlan]].

See the '''[https://act.hoyolab.com/ys/app/interactive-map/index.html?lang=en-us#/map/2?shown_types=675 Teyvat Interactive Map]''' for specific locations.
